author: JOHN DANISZEWSKI
title: Putin waves nuclear sword in confrontation with the West
description: WARSAW, Poland (AP) — It has been a long time since the threat of using nuclear weapons has been brandished so openly by a world leader, but Vladimir Putin has just done it, warning in a speech that he has the weapons available if anyone dares to military mea…
